title: Curtain space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Curtain space is a hotspot in the parlour, dining room, bedroom, and portal nexus of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Curtain space
Curtain space
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationPlayer-owned house (parlour, dining room, bedroom, portal nexus)
OptionsBuild
ExamineYou can build curtains here.
Advanced data
Object ID4524, 15263, 15302, 33351

Curtain space is a hotspot in the parlour, dining room, bedroom, and portal nexus of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[1] Level Curtains Materials Experience Cost
1 2 Torn curtains Plank x3
Bolt of cloth x3
Nails x3 		132 3,750 - 6,192[2]
2 18 Curtains Oak plank x3
Bolt of cloth x3 		225 4,281
3 40 Opulent curtains Teak plank x3
Bolt of cloth x3 		315 5,451
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.
  2. ^ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.
